This guide was written by TUGs and is totally free, but if you want to support my work use: https://www.youtube.com/user/HydroxXTV
Every Level you should grind 2-5 experience bars, this will make sure that this guide works properly!

Now do Uldaman quests, this will require MULTIPLE travels from Uldaman to IF and back I will explain this in the next couple of steps, the loot quest markers will be all OUTSIDE of Uldaman allthough some stuff is inside!
Text: Now do Uldaman quests, this will require MULTIPLE travels from Uldaman to IF and back I will explain this in the next couple of steps, the loot quest markers will be all OUTSIDE of Uldaman allthough some stuff is inside!

Name: Go further into Uldaman whilst keeping left, go up the small ramp and take the FIRST to the rest.The Room is round-ish and kill Magregan Deepshadow, down in the pit loot Ancient Chest->Go Back and take the first to the left(Area is filled with Troggs) At the end there is a chest to loot.
Text: Go further into Uldaman whilst keeping left, go up the small ramp and take the FIRST to the rest.The Room is round-ish and kill Magregan Deepshadow, down in the pit loot Ancient Chest->Go Back and take the first to the left(Area is filled with Troggs) At the end there is a chest to loot.

Name: If you havent found Shattered Necklace yet, go into the dungeon and grind Troggs untill you do so. Run outside
Text: If you havent found Shattered Necklace yet, go into the dungeon and grind Troggs untill you do so. Run outside

Name: Do a full run of Uldaman up to Grimlok
Text: Do a full run of Uldaman up to Grimlok

Name: Take the Gni'kiv Medallion from the chest on the table
Text: Take the Gni'kiv Medallion from the chest on the table

Name: In the same Room as the dwarves there is an Urn for the Topaz
Text: In the same Room as the dwarves there is an Urn for the Topaz

Name: Run into the room with Ironaya to finish The Hidden Chamber
Text: Run into the room with Ironaya to finish The Hidden Chamber

Name: In the Room with Galgann Firehammer open the cache to get the Ruby and Tablet of Will from the Tablet
Text: In the Room with Galgann Firehammer open the cache to get the Ruby and Tablet of Will from the Tablet

Name: Kill Grimlok, loot the Sapphire and use [Talvash's Phial of Scrying] to turnin
Text: Kill Grimlok, loot the Sapphire and use [Talvash's Phial of Scrying] to turnin

Name: If the Hearthstone isnt ready....Run to Loch Modan and Fly to IF
Text: If the Hearthstone isnt ready....Run to Loch Modan and Fly to IF
